mention.text: Snowden testifying in the case regarding the National Security Agency -LRB- NSA -RRB- 's activities in Germany
NSA spying in person Germany will not be inviting whistleblower Edward Snowden to testify in front of a parliamentary committee which investigates US spying tactics of EU leaders and nationals
Merkel , which included over 300 intelligence reports
the investigative committee from Chancellor Angela Merkel
German opposition members from the Left and Green party who are involved in the investigation
